123847.予期せぬエラーにより\n処理を実行することが できませんでした。:
Due to an unexpected error, we are unable to
perform the operation...

123848.予期せぬエラーにより\n処理を実行することが できませんでした。:
Due to an unexpected error, we are unable to
perform the operation...

123849.貯金箱を 置いたので\n家からゴールド銀行に お金を預けたり\n引き出すことが:
Now that you've placed the piggy bank, you can deposit and withdraw money from your house to the Gold Bank! The piggy bank can
only be used by the owner of the house... No one but the owner can touch the money...

123850.きせかえドールを置いたので\n自分の装備品を きせかえドールに着せて\n飾れるよ:
Now that I've placed the Kisekae dolls, I can outfit them with my own equipment! You can equip your Kisekae doll with your own
equipment using "Kisekae"... You can use "Change" to change your current equipment and your dress-up doll's equipment in one shot.
However, if the doll contains equipment that you can't equip, or if it's brand new, you won't be able to do a one-shot change.

123851.きせかえドールを置いたので\n自分の装備品を きせかえドールに着せて\n飾れるよ:
Now that I've placed the Kisekae dolls, I can outfit them with my own equipment! You can equip your Kisekae doll with your own
equipment using "Kisekae"... You can use "Change" to change your current equipment and your dress-up doll's equipment in one shot.
However, if the doll contains equipment that you can't equip, you won't be able to perform a one-shot change. You can only use this
dress-up doll if you've set a one-time password... If you stop using the one-time password, you won't be able to remove the
equipment you're wearing.

123852.不明なエラーにより\n処理を終了できませんでした。:
The process cannot be terminated due to an
unknown error...

123853.この家具は 他の人が つかっています。:
This furniture has been used by other
people...

123855.ここに 家具は 配置できません。\n家具は 平らなところに 置きましょう。:
You cannot place that here. Try again on a
flat surface.

123856.ここに 家具は 配置できません。\n家具は 家の中か庭に置きましょう。:
You cannot place that here. Try again either
inside or outside of your home.

123857.近くに たくさんの家具があるので\nここには 置けません。:
There is too much furniture nearby, so you
can't place that here.

123858.床下水そう用ハッチを 置いたので\n釣ったさかなを 水そう床に飾れるように\nな:
You placed down a Water Hatch! Now you can display fish that you've caught in your aquarium floor!
There are five different types of aquarium floors to choose from, and you can display a maximum of five fish at once.
Only the house's owner can put in or remove fish, but anyone can view the aquarium floor's details.
Try showing off your most prized catches in your aquarium floor!

123859.モンスターのおうちを 置いたので\nお庭に 仲間モンスターをはなすことが\nでき:
Now that you've set up your monster house, you can release your monsters into the garden! When you release a monster, you can
choose whether to let it live in the monster house or go for a walk around the neighborhood... You can also pet your
companion monsters only in the residential village. You can also pet other people's monsters... Each time a monster is petted,
its master receives a gift as a thank you... Let's pet them all!

123860.郵便ポストを 置いたので \nポストから 手紙や荷物を送ったり\n受け取ったり:
We've put in a post box so you can send and receive letters and packages through the post! The letters and packages you can
receive at the post box are the same as those delivered to the post office... On the postbox, there are options such as "Receive",
"Send" and "Sales receipt", but only the owner of the house can use them. However, if you have permission, you can send a letter or
package directly to the owner of the house... You can change the permissions by going to the door menu, calling the manager, and going
to the manager's menu, under permissions, and then going to "Use Post Office Box." In the "View Post Office Box" section, you can view
some of the letters that were sent to adventurers...

123861.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置いたので\n家に遊びにきてくれた人が \nメッ:
I've put up a <%sL_FURNITURE> so that people who come to my house can leave a message! Each person can leave 3 messages a day... You
can save up to 30 messages per day. When someone leaves a message, the slime will light up, so you'll know... Messages can also
be viewed by visitors, so you can write your own messages there too!

123862.モーモンバザーを置いたので\n家に遊びにきてくれた人向けの\nお店を開くことが:
Now that you have the Mormon Bazaar, you can open a shop for people who come to your house! In the Mormon Bazaar, you can put a
price on the items you've placed in your storage furniture to sell them. When the item sells, Mormon will turn into Pink Mormon!
When there's nothing left to sell, he turns scary... Only the owner of the house gets the money. If you have 999 sales that you haven't
received, you can't sell any more items. Now, let's set up the items for sale!

123863.おもいで映写機を 置きました！\n『映写機をつかう』を選ぶと これまでに見た\n:
We've set up a memory projector! If you select the "Use Projector" option, you'll be able to watch the events of the scenarios
you've seen so far!

123864.収納家具を 設置しました！\n収納家具を設置すると アイテムを\n<%nL_VA:
Storage furniture has been installed! When you install storage furniture, you can store up to <%nL_VAULT_SLOT> types of items...
Please note that even if you increase the number of storage furniture, the maximum number of types will remain
<%nL_VAULT_SLOT>...

123866.貯金箱を 置いたので\n家からゴールド銀行に お金を預けたり\n引き出すことが:
Now that you've placed the piggy bank, you can deposit and withdraw money from your house to the Gold Bank! The piggy bank can
only be used by the owner of the house... No one but the owner can touch the money...

123867.きせかえドールを置いたので\n自分の装備品を きせかえドールに着せて\n飾れるよ:
Now that I've placed the Kisekae dolls, I can outfit them with my own equipment! You can equip your Kisekae doll with your own
equipment using "Kisekae"... You can use "Change" to change your current equipment and your dress-up doll's equipment in one shot.
However, if the doll contains equipment that you can't equip, or if it's brand new, you won't be able to do a one-shot change.

125429.壁かけ家具は 配置する時に\n位置と奥行きを 決めることができます。\n配置後に:
Wall-mounted furniture is designed to be placed in a specific position and depth... The depth can be adjusted after placement...
Where wall-mounted furniture cannot be placed, the furniture itself becomes translucent... You can't see yourself while
it's in place...

125430.壁かけ家具は 配置する時に\n位置と奥行きを 決めることができます。\n配置後に:

139347.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置いたので\n絵葉書を 家具に設定して\nかざれ:
Now that you've placed a <%sL_FURNITURE>, you can hang your own personal postcards as furniture!
You can select a postcard you are carrying and display it on the <%sL_FURNITURE> by selecting "Set Postcard".
Only postcards stored under "Written Mail" can be displayed. Postcards that you have already sent cannot be displayed.
The displayed postcard can be viewed by anyone, but only the house's owner is allowed to change it.
Also, only one type of photo can be displayed for each different type of frame. The same types of frame will display the same postcard.

139348.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置いたので\n絵葉書を 家具に設定して\nかざれ:
Now that you've placed a <%sL_FURNITURE>, you can hang your own personal postcards as furniture!
You can select a postcard you are carrying and display it on the <%sL_FURNITURE> by selecting "Set Postcard".
Only postcards stored under "Written Mail" can be displayed. Postcards that you have already sent cannot be displayed.
The displayed postcard can be viewed by anyone, but only the house's owner is allowed to change it.
Also, only one type of photo can be displayed for each different type of frame. The same types of frame will display the same postcard.

286386.<%sL_FURNITURE>を 置いたので\nアストルティア放送局の 放送を\:
This <%sL_FURNITURE> will allow you to watch the Astoltia Broadcast from the comfort of your own home.
Only the house's owner is allowed to operate this.
In order to view broadcasts, please set "Watch" to "On" under "Misc.", "Settings", "Preferences", "Astoltia Broadcast Station".
Please watch the broadcast with good manners and enjoy the show!
